version_description:
- New Features: Legend Tournament. You can now compete against other players in Legend Tournament and win the powerful Heroes!
- New Features: Type Challenge mode in Skyscraper. In this mode that you can only deploy Heroes of the designated Type, how far up can you go?
- 2 New Heroes Added: Bio Type "Terrifying Ninja" - Undying Hanzo; Gene Type "Aerial King" - Falcon
- Modified the skills of Killer Queen and Galaxy Lord
- Modified some enemies in Campaign mode
- UI of several features have been optimized
- Fixed bugs

- Hero Bond System is added. When the Heroes with bonds are deployed in the same battle, their powerful Bond Skills will be unlocked!
- Added Gene Hero - Iceburge. This powerful Tank, Healer, and Support hero will help you get past any difficulties!
- Added T-rex skin - Winter Ceremony. He has prepared something special for you!
- Added Hero Panorama System. Gather heroes to bring additional stats bonus for your team!
- Fixed Bugs

- Added Mystic Hero - Nezha. There is no sin hidden under his fiery inquisition!
- Added Quarterback Skin - Soaring Bull, may we be as awesome as ever in the new year!
- Fixed bugs

- Added Ace Tournament mode. The player can now build base, expand territories, and capture famous city on a whole new map. Defeat the enemy with your guild and be the Ace in this tournament!
- Added Mech Hero - Yeon. She can crush anything that gets in her way with her overwhelming Taekwondo technique!
- Added Skin for Falcon - "Sun God".
- Adjusted the skill "Morale Boost" of Hero "SPG". The effect is now changed to: When the hero scores a critical hit, every team member will restore energy by 10 points
- Fixed Bugs

- Added Mystic Hero - Blizzard, who is the founding master of the mysterious frost mage, possessing the power to summon blizzard!
- Added new skin for Tigtron - Phantom Unicorn. General's soul has perished from the war, and I dream of the iron steeds and the glacier!
- Added new Hero Bond: Tiger Roar of Mount Jiri. It's a powerful bond between May Kim and Tigtron which brings out endless power!
- Edited Tigtron's skill - Warring Tiger Form. New Effect: When Tigtron is in Warring Tiger Form, his own common attack can attack all enemy front row targets
- Added powerful set recast function. You can now use the extra set part to recast into new set parts!
- Ace Tournament is now fully available. We have made the following optimization and new functions based on everyone's feedback:
1. Added the function to garrison on a friendly land
2. After a team is defeated in a battle, the hero will enter injure status. The hero in an injure status cannot go out to carry out order and they cannot take part in the defense of the base
3. Added Ace Tournament War Token system
- Fixed bugs

- Added Mystic Hero - Blizzard, who is the founding master of the mysterious frost mage, possessing the power to summon blizzard!
- Added new skin for Tigtron - Phantom Unicorn. General's soul has perished from the war, and I dream of the iron steeds and the glacier!
- Added new Hero Bond: Tiger Roar of Mount Jiri. It's a powerful bond between May Kim and Tigtron which brings out endless power!
- Edited Tigtron's skill - Warring Tiger Form. New Effect: When Tigtron is in Warring Tiger Form, his own common attack can attack all enemy front row targets
- Added powerful set recast function. You can now use the extra set part to recast into new set parts!
- Ace Tournament is now fully available. We have made the following optimization and new functions based on everyone's feedback:
1. Added the function to garrison on a friendly land
2. After a team is defeated in a battle, the hero will enter injure status. The hero in an injure status cannot go out to carry out order and they cannot take part in the defense of the base
3. Added Ace Tournament War Token system
- Fixed bugs

- Added Mystic Hero - Blizzard, who is the founding master of the mysterious frost mage, possessing the power to summon blizzard!
- Added new skin for Tigtron - Phantom Unicorn. General's soul has perished from the war, and I dream of the iron steeds and the glacier!
- Added new Hero Bond: Tiger Roar of Mount Jiri. It's a powerful bond between May Kim and Tigtron which brings out endless power!
- Edited Tigtron's skill - Warring Tiger Form. New Effect: When Tigtron is in Warring Tiger Form, his own common attack can attack all enemy front row targets
- Added powerful set recast function. You can now use the extra set part to recast into new set parts!
- Ace Tournament is now fully available. We have made the following optimization and new functions based on everyone's feedback:
1. Added the function to garrison on a friendly land
2. After a team is defeated in a battle, the hero will enter injure status. The hero in an injure status cannot go out to carry out order and they cannot take part in the defense of the base
3. Added Ace Tournament War Token system
- Fixed bugs

- New Legendary Operation Hero - Stella! She travels through time and space from the battlefield of "Ark of War", bringing in science and justice to this world!
- New Sacred Beast - Soulray. A mysterious power from the deep blue, watching over your team!
- Added Character Selection function within the server. You can now switch between the characters of your server in settings - server page
- Edited the material cost when merging 4-star heroes to 5-star heroes. The requirement of 3-star heroes of the certain type is changed to 3-star heroes of any types
- Fixed bugs
